name: Jimmy With His Son
description:
Poor naive Jimmy, has a stubborn child. Unlucky for Jimmy,  as a parent he tries to handle him. The child set off a nonsense journey. Jimmy had to follow him in order to keep him safe. The way is full of mysterious obstacles, puzzles, unexpected things, and more. Wondering, how the journey will end ?

Play it, to figure it out.

Challenge your friends how fast you will end the game and how many fails you will get...

Hope you will enjoy..
